faqs.question: Is BHU PET still conducted as a separate exam?
faqs.answer: No, from 2022 onwards, BHU PET has been merged with the CUET PG (Common University Entrance Test for Postgraduate), conducted by the National Testing Agency (NTA) for admission to postgraduate courses at BHU and other central universities.
